title: The Italian Job (1969) Multi Audio&Subs (See Post)
description:
This is the Special Edition version



Audio: English 5.1 / German / English 2.0



Subtitles: English / German / Arabic / Bulgarian / Czech / Danish / Dutch / Finnish / Hungarian / Icelandic / Norwegian / Polish / Romanian / Swedish / Turkish



Subtitles for the Hearing Impaired: English



*****************************************************************************


Extra Features include: Audio Commentary by Mathew Field and Producer Michael Deeley

Deleted Scenes with commentary + 3 Documentaries "The Great Idea" "The Self Preservation Society" "Get a Bloomin' Move On" also has theatrical trailers


*****************************************************************************



PAL



926 x 8MB packets 

Initial Seeding Process Used (This means the quicker you upload the 8MB I send to you the faster you get another one from me.)



Charlie's got a 'Job' to do. Having just left prison, he finds one of his friends has attempted a high risk job in Italy right under the nose of the Mafia. Charlie's friend doesn't get very far so Charlie takes over the 'Job'. Using three Mini Coopers, a couple of Jaguars and a bus, he hopes to bring Torino to a standstill, steal the Gold and escape.




 ***** As Always, My Thanks in advance to those who stay on to seed after their download has been completed it is much appreciated *****
